name: Ouroboros - Chase your tail
description:
A game based on the ouroboros, a snake from various mythologies depicted eating its own tail. This is a take on the snake formula, but with a few twists.

Turn left and right with Left/Right or A/D. Try to collect all the orbs and then catch your own tail. The game can be paused with Esc, which I forgot to write in the how to section.

Time spent: ~12h
